room_title: Escape room "The Castle" by Amazing Escape Room in Bridgewater
review: This room is a MUST if you are a fan of horror or darker themes. Very immersive. I went in a group of 8 and we finished with less than ten minutes on the clock! Definitely a room that has challenging puzzles. Loved it!

room_title: Escape room "The Castle" by Amazing Escape Room in Bridgewater
review: My husband and I had an amazing time and Kevin was the best game master! The castle was so much fun and truly enthralling. Kevin was really helpful and made our experience even better! We will definitely be back soon!
